com.mygdx.game

Class BoxCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.BoxBody
      • com.mygdx.game.BoxCharacter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FireBoy2D, WaterGirl2D

    public class BoxCharacter
extends BoxBody
    A class derived from BoxBody that represents the characters bodies on the world
